bug.summary: Save bug for Non-ASCII class names
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>Description</denchmark-h>
Bug for saving confusion matrices with Non-ASCII class names <denchmark-h:h4>Steps/Code to Reproduce</denchmark-h>
>>> cm = ConfusionMatrix(["¢ℓαѕѕ1","¢ℓαѕѕ2"],["¢ℓαѕѕ1","¢ℓαѕѕ2"]) >>> save_stat_data = cm.save_stat("test") >>> save_csv_data = cm.save_csv("test") >>> save_html_data = cm.save_html("test") <denchmark-h:h4>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
>>> save_stat_data["Status"] True >>> save_csv_data["Status"] True >>> save_html_data["Status"] True <denchmark-h:h4>Actual Behavior</denchmark-h>
>>> save_stat_data["Status"] False >>> save_stat_data["Message"] "'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 27-30: character maps to <undefined>" >>> save_csv_data["Status"] False >>> save_csv_data["Message"] "'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 8-11: character maps to <undefined>" >>> save_html_data["Status"] False >>> save_html_data["Message"] "'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 284-287: character maps to <undefined>" <denchmark-h:h4>Operating System</denchmark-h>
Windows 10 <denchmark-h:h4>Python Version</denchmark-h>
Python 3.6 <denchmark-h:h4>PyCM Version</denchmark-h>
PyCM 2.4
